title: Animal Escape!
description:
Things get literally wild as Joe shares some stories from when he moonlighted as a zoo-man during his first few years teaching. Then he shares other teacher stories of animal shenanigans including stories featuring Madagascar hissing cockroaches, an echidna, and of course snakes!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
